enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the creation of a Parser instance with an HTML TreeBuilder.
Both methods process HTML strings, albeit with different goals (full document parsing vs. entity unescaping).
The unescapeEntities method initializes the parse state similarly to the initialiseParse method, which is crucial for setting up the parsing context.
The unescapeEntities method might benefit from the context provided by parsing fragments, especially if the input string is part of a larger HTML fragment.
